usage.title: AI Usage Dashboard
usage.description: Monitor AI feature usage, costs, and performance
usage.dailyUsageDesc: Number of AI runs per day

settings.title: AI Settings
settings.description: Configure AI features, models, and spending limits
settings.savedDesc: AI settings have been updated successfully.
settings.unsavedDesc: You have unsaved changes. Click "Save Changes" to apply them.
settings.featuresDesc: Enable or disable AI features for your organization
settings.modelConfigDesc: Select default and fallback AI models
settings.maxTokensDesc: Maximum tokens allowed in a single AI request
settings.spendingLimitsDesc: Set monthly budget caps for AI usage
settings.monthlyCapDesc: Leave empty for no spending limit. AI features will be disabled when cap is reached.
settings.capWarning: When the monthly cap is reached, all AI features will be temporarily disabled until the next billing cycle.
